ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Very true.... nothing will beat the good old DA and that line of spells.... I just wish the party would listen to me and run when I say... I mean we do have 18
ygData.messageBody:
Very true.... nothing will beat the good old DA and that line of spells....
I just wish the party would listen to me and run when I say... I mean we do
have 18 sec to get the hell out of there before damage starts.... ahh
well... Damn Galian and him not wanting to run..

Jaxim


>From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Memmed spells
>Date: Thu, 3 Jun 1999 10:54:24 -0400
>
>From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>
>Yes dodge is great but cannot be relied upon, a clerics dodge skill will
>never be any better than good, you will never master it. I can think of
>perhaps one time where gate saved my ass in the heat of battle. now Divine
>Aura that's another story, that spell has saved my butt more times than I
>can count.
>
>Bree Nightingale (soon to be Wyndsdale) = )
>32nd cleric of Fennin Ro
>-----Original Message-----
>From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Date: Thursday, June 24, 1999 9:24 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Memmed spells
>
>
> >From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
> >
> >I am not too sure if I totally agree with ya there Daniels.... At 17 I
>was
> >able to gate from a yellow and blue that was hitting me by gating (I told
>my
> >troop to RUN and luckly they did...).... GOT TO LOVE DODGE!... hehehehe
> >
> >
> >Jaxim
> >
> >
> >
> >>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
> >>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Memmed spells
> >>Date: Tue, 22 Jun 1999 16:33:10 -0400 (EDT)
> >>
> >>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
> >>
> >>I"m not sure what level you are but gate is not good for safety unless
>you
> >>are low level or you are high level fighting greens. When you get to
> >>the mid 20's and start fighting stuff that hits you for mega damage gate
> >>will not work. Divine is the way to go. Now a divine and then gate
> >>when the divine wears off will work..(that is if you are grouped) most
> >>mosnters will move off you when you divine..
> >>
> >>Mr. J Daniels
> >>
> >>
> >>On Tue, 22 Jun 1999, Jeff wrote:
> >>
> >> > From: "Jeff" <jeffh@...>
> >> >
> >> > > Wow, no divine aura - brave guy.
> >> > >
> >> >
> >> > Its not so much the, lack of divine aura that I find brave. Its the
>fact
> >> > that there is also no gate. Only one is needed to get you out of
> >>trouble.
> >> >
